name: reconcileTime
description: The time lineage was processed in UTC

fields.name: jobId
fields.description: The BigQuery/Operation Job Id which caused the change to the table.

fields.name: jobTime
fields.description: Job completion time in UTC

fields.name: actuator
fields.description: The email address of the authorized executor of Job, It can be a person or a service account.

fields.name: transform
fields.description: The transform operations done on source data. E.g. A SQL query or pipeline version information etc.

fields.name: sql
fields.description: The BigQuery or Dataflow SQL if that was the transformation operation.

fields.name: target
fields.description: The Data Entity which is created/modified

fields.name: kind
fields.description: Type of Entity - (UNKNOWN, QUERY_LEVEL_TABLE, CLOUD_STORAGE_FILE, BIGQUERY_TABLE)

fields.name: linkedResource
fields.description: A valid Fully Qualified GCP Resource name.

fields.name: operation
fields.description: The BigQuery Job type e.g. QUERY, COPY or IMPORT

fields.name: parents
fields.description: The tables which were read for generating/updating the source table.

fields.name: kind
fields.description: Type of Entity - (UNKNOWN, QUERY_LEVEL_TABLE, CLOUD_STORAGE_FILE, BIGQUERY_TABLE)

fields.name: linkedResource
fields.description: A valid Fully Qualified GCP Resource name.

name: columnLineage
description: Column Level lineage if its a QUERY operation

fields.name: target
fields.description: The Column Entity which is created/modified

fields.name: column
fields.description: Name of the column in the Data Entity

fields.name: operations
fields.description: List of Functions/Operations done on the source columns. e.g. SUM, CONCAT

fields.name: parents
fields.description: The Column Entity which is read/used to generate the output

fields.name: table
fields.description: The Data Entity

fields.name: kind
fields.description: Type of Entity - (UNKNOWN, QUERY_LEVEL_TABLE, CLOUD_STORAGE_FILE, BIGQUERY_TABLE)

fields.name: linkedResource
fields.description: A valid Fully Qualified GCP Resource name.

fields.name: column
fields.description: Name of the column in the Data Entity
